suppress.notes:
file name: dirgra-0.3.jar
This file gets detected as jruby v0.3 due to a bad pattern reported in some older CVEs (listed below)

file name: jruby-stdlib-9.2.7.0.jar: jquery.js
JRuby ships a pretty old version of jquery in some dependency for Rdoc. We don't generate any rdoc, so we should be fine.
